features: Decorate the air with our Glade Plug In air freshener
These Oil PlugIns change the mood with 2x more adjustability (vs. previous Glade warmer)
Indulge yourself with our air freshener dispenser full of notes of vanilla, caramel and sweet nutmeg
This Glade air freshener fragrance is crafted by master perfumers and infused with Essential Oils
Enjoy up to 50 days of fragrance* with Glade PlugIn Refills (*per refill, on low setting)
body.description: Indulge yourself with air with our Glade Vanilla Caramel Twist PlugIns air freshener for home. It's crafted by master perfumers with notes of vanilla, caramel and sweet nutmeg. Make your life sweeter with our scent diffuser and change the mood with 2x more adjustability (vs. previous Glade warmer). Express your mood with this electric oil diffuser and Vanilla Caramel Twist fragrance. Simply remove the cap from the refill and insert it into the Glade plug in warmer . Plug the warmer into an outlet and adjust the level of fragrance to create the mood you want. Feel right at home with Glade's PlugIn air freshener and fragrance infused with Essential Oils .

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How to Use STEP 1 Remove the cap from the refill and insert it into warmer. Then, plug the warmer upright into an outlet. STEP 2 The PlugIns Scented Oil plug is adjustable for horizontal and vertical outlets. STEP 3 Adjust the level of fragrance to create the mood you want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweet and Heavenly Fragrance
reviews.reviewText: The Glade PlugIns Refills Air Freshener in Vanilla Caramel Twist has genuinely transformed the atmosphere in my home, and I couldn't be happier with the results. These scented oil refills have a scent that can only be described as amazing.Pros:Incredible Scent: The Vanilla Caramel Twist fragrance is simply divine. It fills my home with a warm and comforting aroma that combines the sweetness of vanilla with the rich, indulgent notes of caramel. Every time I enter a room, it feels like I'm stepping into a bakery with freshly baked treats. The scent is not overwhelming but instead provides a subtle and inviting ambiance.Long-Lasting: These Glade PlugIns refills are impressively long-lasting. Each refill bottle contains 3.35 fluid ounces of scented oil, and they have consistently delivered a delightful fragrance for weeks on end. I appreciate that I don't have to constantly replace them.Easy to Use: Installing the refills into the Glade PlugIns warmer is a breeze. It takes just a few seconds, and you can adjust the intensity of the fragrance to your liking, allowing you to customize the scent experience for different rooms and occasions.Versatile: The Vanilla Caramel Twist scent is versatile and suitable for various spaces within my home. Whether it's the living room, bathroom, bedroom, or kitchen, it creates a cozy and inviting atmosphere everywhere.Value for Money: This pack of 5 refills offers great value for the price. Considering the longevity and effectiveness of the fragrance, it's an economical choice compared to some other air fresheners on the market.Cons:Personal Preference: While I find the Vanilla Caramel Twist scent amazing, fragrance preferences are subjective. Some individuals may prefer different scents, so it's a good idea to test it out if you're unsure.In summary, the Glade PlugIns Refills Air Freshener in Vanilla Caramel Twist is a true delight for the senses. Its heavenly fragrance, reminiscent of vanilla and caramel, transforms any space into a warm and inviting oasis. With long-lasting performance and easy installation, it offers excellent value for money. If you're looking to infuse your home with a captivating and comforting aroma, I highly recommend giving these Glade PlugIns refills a try. Your home will thank you for it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice fragrance.
reviews.reviewText: The fragrance is really nice, smells like cupcakes and hint of caramel. I have 3 plugs in in my apartment on low level and you can smell it from the hallway of my floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would bathe in this if I could
reviews.reviewText: They last quite a while!! I have mine on the strongest setting and they last about 2 weeks. My whole house smells like a warm pastry. You can really smell all notes. I’m not a big fan of caramel or caramel scent but this is just perfect. They blend well together. I’ve bought multiple times and will continue to!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice warm/comforting scent. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 packs and 1 pack was perfect. It had every refill full of scent and the scent was amazing! The second pack however was weird. The refill bottles were only half full but 2 were about a quarter full and the scent was nothing like what I expected. The scent was floral and musky. Nothing like described. The color of the scented juice was also different. The first pack was almost caramel color and the second was clear color. I ordered both packs at the same time so it's just weird.

reviews.reviewText: I like the smells permeating the house
